entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of rain or drizzle beginning near midnight. Fog patches. Amount 2 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 10 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
